name: Wax Wings
description:
well, it was worth a shot.
let's just pack up and wait for p-2.

featuring kosuzu and mamizou.

it isn't good, and i didn't say it was. all the art from "that part" done in an hour at 2 am with mouse. i'll get something submitted, god damn it. art tablet or no art tablet, ultrakill or no ultrakill.

second in the series of visual novels i rush out at the end of a jam for no good reason, i guess. oh god, is this going to become a whole thing?
